Name: amtd
Overview:
Automated Movie Trailer Downloader :: AMTD is a Radarr Companion script to automatically download movie trailers for use in media applications
  [br][br][b][span style='color: #E80000;']!!!Important!!![/span][/u] :: You must add a volume that matches your Radarr's volume mappings associated with Radarr's Library Root Folder settings[/b]

@attributes.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
@attributes.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

@attributes.Name: Script Interval
@attributes.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

@attributes.Name: Radarr Url
@attributes.Description: Set domain or IP to your Radarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s...

@attributes.Name: Extras Type
@attributes.Description: all or trailers :: all downloads all available videos (trailers, clips, featurettes, etc...) :: trailers only downloads trailers

@attributes.Name: Extras Audio Language
@attributes.Description: Set the primary desired language, if not found, fallback to next langauge in the list... (this is a ',' separated list of ISO 639-1 language codes)

@attributes.Name: Extras Format
@attributes.Description: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

@attributes.Name: Extras Subtitle Langauge
@attributes.Description: Desired Language Code :: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

@attributes.Name: Single Trailer
@attributes.Description: true = enabled :: Only downloads the first available trailer, does not apply to other extras type

@attributes.Name: Prefer Existing Trailer
@attributes.Description: true = enabled :: Checks for existing trailer file, and skips it if found

@attributes.Name: Use Folders
@attributes.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders within the movie folder for extras

@attributes.Name: End Client Compatibility
@attributes.Description: plex or emby or jellyfin :: Select the appropriate client for maximum compatibility
